title: Shadowed Water
description: Who said fire and water don't mix?The Inquisition have gone to ground, and fire witch Ryan Bright is tasked with finding them, before his family is harmed again. When a suspicious individual arrives who may be the only lead ASIS have, he has no problem extracting information from them in any way he can.But he isn't prepared for Aanya.A Naga princess from Bhogavati, the precognitive snake shifter has a daunting task ahead of her. Save the world--or at least, save the child who'll do it for them. Armed with a vision and water magic, Aanya knows someone will arrive to help her in her quest.Too bad he wants to tie her up first.Fast paced action.A SCORCHING fire witch.A mysterious snake shifter.Red hot love scenes.Who's ready to play with the elements?First published in Finding Forever: A Shifter Anthology
author: S.E. Welsh
